    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFriendlyDrone()
    Add Friendly drone with random X and Y position into the Arena Capacity of the Arena is set New drone is added if there is capacity otherwise drone is not added drone is added to free space

    adjust drones that need to be moved

    • CheckDroneAngle

      public double CheckDroneAngle​(double x, double y, double rad, double ang, int notID)
      Check angle of drone: if hitting wall, rebound; if hitting drone, change angle;
      Parameters:
      x - drone x position
      y - y
      rad - radius
      ang - current angle
      notID - identify of drone not to be checked
      Returns:
      new angle

    • checkFriendly

      check if the friendly drone has been hit by a predator
      Parameters:
      the - Friendly Drone Remove drone if hit
      Returns:
      true if hit

      public Drone getDroneAt​(double x, double y)
      Search to see if there is a drone at position x,y in Arena
      Parameters:
      x - x position
      y - y psotion
      Returns:
      null if no drone, otherwise return drone
